For a research compendium, it is recommended to include the following contents:

- A paragraph that describes the high-level purpose of the project. If the
  compendium has an associated academic paper, name it.

- The citation information in a bibliography style and also the BibTeX entry.

- Instructions on how to run the research compendium locally or in the cloud.

- A summary of the file structure.

- Licenses about the text and figures, code and data.

- Instructions on how to contribute to this research compendium
